Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a device that connects two students, representing a solution for communicating over a distance with sound.
The student can show the string telephone being used by two students to send and receive information.
The student can illustrate how the device uses sound waves to communicate between the students.
The student can indicate the materials used in the string telephone, showing their understanding of the materials provided for the task.
The student can demonstrate the importance of technology in communication between people who are far apart.
